list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: teach (a person or animal) a particular skill or type of behavior through practice and instruction over a period of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the plan trains people for promotion
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kế hoạch đào tạo người để khuyến mãi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: point or aim something, typically a gun or camera, at.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the detective trained his gun on the side door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thám tử huấn luyện súng của mình ở cửa bên

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Charles trained to Chicago with Emily
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Charles được đào tạo đến Chicago với Emily

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: entice (someone) by offering pleasure or a reward.
a series of railroad cars moved as a unit by a locomotive or by integral motors.
a succession of vehicles or pack animals traveling in the same direction.
a long piece of material attached to the back of a formal dress or robe that trails along the ground.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bride wore a cream silk dress with a train
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô dâu mặc một chiếc váy lụa kem với một chuyến tàu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a trail of gunpowder for firing an explosive charge.
